citation.article-title: Microbulbifer halophilus sp. nov., a moderately halophilic bacterium from north-west China.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Microbulbifer halophilus sp. nov.
Microbulbifer halophilus (ha.lo.phi′lus. Gr. n. hals, halos salt; Gr. adj. philos loving; N.L. masc. adj. halophilus salt-loving).
Cells are aerobic, Gram-negative rods, motile with a single polar flagellum.
Colonies are yellowish-brown, smooth, opaque and mucoid on modified ISP 5 medium.
Moderately halophilic, growing in a wide range (1–20 % w/v) of salt concentrations, with optimal growth at 10 % NaCl (w/v).
No growth in the absence of NaCl.
Growth occurs at 10–45 °C and pH 6.0–9.0, with optimal growth at 37 °C and pH 7.0–8.0.
Indole and H2S are not produced.
Gelatin is hydrolysed, but aesculin, casein, starch and Tweens 40 and 80 are not hydrolysed.

In the API 50CH system, acid is produced from N-acetylglucosamine, aesculin, l-arabinose, d-fucose, d-glucose, glycogen, d-lactose, maltose, l-rhamnose, turanose, d-tagatose, starch, d-xylose, potassium 2-ketogluconate and potassium 5-ketogluconate, but not from d-adonitol, amygdalin, d-arabinose, d- or l-arabitol, arbutin, cellobiose, dulcitol, erythritol, l-fucose, d-fructose, d-galactose, gentiobiose, glycerol, inositol, inulin, d-lyxose, d-mannitol, d-mannose, melezitose, melibiose, methyl α-d-mannopyranoside, methyl α-d-glucopyranoside, methyl β-d-xylopyranoside, raffinose, d-ribose, sucrose, salicin, d-sorbitol, l-sorbose, trehalose, xylitol, l-xylose or potassium gluconate.
In the API ZYM system, alkaline phosphatase, esterase (C4), esterase lipase (C8), leucine arylamidase, valine arylamidase and naphthol-AS-BI-phosphohydrolase tests are positive.

Lipase (C14), cystine arylamidase, trypsin, α-chymotrypsin, acid phosphatase, α-galactosidase, β-galactosidase, β-glucuronidase, α-glucosidase, N-acetyl-β-glucosaminidase, β-glucosidase, α-mannosidase and α-fucosidase tests are negative.
Q-8 is the predominant lipoquinone, at a peak area ratio of approximately 91.5 %.
Major fatty acids are iso-C15 : 0, iso-C17 : 0, C16 : 0 and iso-C17 : 1ω9c.
The G+C content of the DNA of the type strain is 63.2 mol%.
The type strain is YIM 91118T (=CCTCC AB 206094T =KCTC 12848T), isolated from a saline soil sample in Xinjiang province, north-west China.
